item.title: Confession
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: [ D.O.P, Sound Postproduction ] Filming, Editing and Audio Postproduction was all done in less than one week in Italy during the Cinemadamare Filmfestival. I stood in as a D.O.P. and did the Sound postproduction. Full credits: Filmed in Milan, Italy, for the Cinemadamare Travelling Film Festival. Directed by: Gabriel Santos & Grace Viccary Written […]
item.content:encoded:
[ D.O.P, Sound Postproduction ]

Filming, Editing and Audio Postproduction was all done in less than one week in Italy during the Cinemadamare Filmfestival.
I stood in as a D.O.P. and did the Sound postproduction.

Full credits:
Filmed in Milan, Italy, for the Cinemadamare Travelling Film Festival.
Directed by: Gabriel Santos & Grace Viccary
Written By: Sergio Cutrona
Director of Photography: Arno De Facq
sound: Arno De Facq
Edited by: Gabriel Santos
Production Designer: Maxwell Mahan
1st AD: Daniela Gutierrez
1st AC: Sienna Aiello
2nd AC: Emma Younan
Girlfriend: Grace Viccary
Lover: Cristian Moriconi

item.title: SNOOZE
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: [ Audio Postproduction ] I did all the Audio postproduction for this short, a project with the most effects I’ve ever used. The director wanted it to be over the top, with a lot of subtle details happening everywhere.
item.content:encoded:
[ Audio Postproduction ]

I did all the Audio postproduction for this short, a project with the most effects I’ve ever used. The director wanted it to be over the top, with a lot of subtle details happening everywhere.

item.title: Divina Tragedia
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: [ Editing, Audio Postproduction, Music Production ] Divina Tragedia is about god being bored and making a game show to entertain himself. I Directed, Edited, did the audio postproduction and produced all the music used in the film.
item.content:encoded:
[ Editing, Audio Postproduction, Music Production ]

Divina Tragedia is about god being bored and making a game show to entertain himself.
I Directed, Edited, did the audio postproduction and produced all the music used in the film.

item.title: Poor
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: [ Audio Postproduction, Music Production ] Poor is a shortfilm about 2 farmers whom try to rob a hotel. I did all the sound recording and postproduction of the audio. Including making, recording and mixing most of the music that was used throughout the film.
item.content:encoded:
[ Audio Postproduction, Music Production ]

Poor is a shortfilm about 2 farmers whom try to rob a hotel. I did all the sound recording and postproduction of the audio. Including making, recording and mixing most of the music that was used throughout the film.

item.title: Self Help
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: [ Director Of Photography ] Self Help is story based on a r/nosleep Reddit post. It was shot in Italy in 2 days.

[ Director Of Photography ]

Self Help is story based on a r/nosleep Reddit post. It was shot in Italy in 2 days.

item.title: A Tale Of Two Punekars
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: [ D.O.P. ] We follow a day in the life of a village and city girl from Pune, India, and their completely divergent relationships with water. Shot in India.
item.content:encoded:
[ D.O.P. ]

We follow a day in the life of a village and city girl from Pune, India, and their completely divergent relationships with water.
Shot in India.

item.title: Laka Lodge
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: [ Camera, Drone Pilot, Editing ] One of the videos created for Laka Lodge, a hotel located in the Comoros. This project consists of one main video (seen here) and 10 smaller videos focused on specific themes. All videos were shot in the Comoros in 3 weeks and edited in Belgium.
item.content:encoded:
[ Camera, Drone Pilot, Editing ]

One of the videos created for Laka Lodge, a hotel located in the Comoros. This project consists of one main video (seen here) and 10 smaller videos focused on specific themes. All videos were shot in the Comoros in 3 weeks and edited in Belgium.
